name: The Pride: life as a lion
name_original: The Pride: life as a lion
description:
Third-person game where you play as a lion, and get to explore a small piece of the savanna.

 You can choose between a female and male lion. When male, you fight other male lions. When female, you hunt animals. 

 I filled the savanna area with a few surprises, other animals, and some locations to make exploring worthwhile. There is an autowalk option, so you don't have to keep holding down a button when moving around.
